title: Privacy Policy | VideoSync
content:
Effective Date: September 14th, 2024

1. Introduction

VideoSync ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our VideoSync service.

2. Information We Collect

Personal Information: We may collect personal information from you, including:

  • Email address (for login)

Third-Party Data: We may obtain information about you from third-party platforms through integrations, including:

  • Google: Authentication information
  • Vimeo: Authentication information
  • Zoom: Authentication information
  • Stripe: Payment information (full name)

3. How We Use Your Information

We may use your information to:

  • Provide and improve our services (e.g., user accounts, login, video downloading / uploading to chosed platforms)
  • Process payments (using Stripe)
  • Communicate with you (e.g., for customer support, updates)
  • Analyze usage patterns and trends
  • Comply with legal obligations

4. Sharing Your Information

We may share your information with:

  • Third-party service providers who help us operate our service (e.g., payment processors, cloud providers)
  • Law enforcement or government agencies as required by law
  • Other third parties with your consent

5. Third-Party Integrations

Our service integrates with Google, Zoom, Vimeo, and Stripe. When you authorize our service to access your accounts on these platforms, we may collect and process information as described in their respective privacy policies. We recommend reviewing their policies for additional information.

6. Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

7. Data Retention

We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services, comply with legal requirements, or resolve disputes.

8. Your Rights

You may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:

  • Access to your information
  • Rectification of inaccurate information
  • Erasure of your information
  • Restriction of processing
  • Data portability
  • Object to processing
  • Withdraw consent (where applicable)

To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@videosync.cloud.

9. Children's Privacy

Our service is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

10. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our website or by other means.

11. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:

VideoSync
support@videosync.cloud
